get.description: 3dslookup.com is an online service that allows users to verify credit and debit card details by entering the first six or eight digits of the card number (BIN/IIN). This lookup helps identify the issuing bank and whether the card supports 3D Secure authentication. The service provides information such as card type, brand, issuing country, bank name, and security features like Verified by Visa or Mastercard SecureCode. An API is available for integration, with limited free requests and premium...

3dslookup.com is an online service that allows users to verify credit and debit card details by entering the first six or eight digits of the card number (BIN/IIN). This lookup helps identify the issuing bank and whether the card supports 3D Secure authentication. The service provides information such as card type, brand, issuing country, bank name, and security features like Verified by Visa or Mastercard SecureCode. An API is available for integration, with limited free requests and premium...
